title.narrative: Financial Products to Promote Climate Change Resilience in Bolivia

description.narrative: The project’s goal is to contribute to improve the climate change resilience of small agricultural producers in Bolivia by channeling credit and basic technical assistance, aimed at fostering investment in adaptation measures that promote the sustainable management of natural resources, and at the same time contribute to stabilizing or increasing productivity.

participating-org.narrative: Inter-American Development Bank, Inter-American Investment Corporation and Multilateral Investment Fund
